records.notes: An Elmira bound C TRAN Route 30 bus was seen at E Seneca St & N Tioga St in Downtown Ithaca.
A Brooktondale bound TCAT Route 53 bus was seen at East Ave & Campus Rd on the Cornell University campus.
A Downtown Ithaca bound TCAT Route 30 bus was seen laying over at Ithaca Mall.

[SPECIAL] A Downtown Ithaca bound TCAT Route 32 bus was seen at Hoy Rd & Campus Rd on the Cornell University campus. Due to the construction of College Ave, Route 32 was detoured, running on Ithaca Rd, Dryden Rd and Hoy Rd in Collegetown.
A Lansing bound TCAT Route 30 bus, a Lansing bound TCAT Route 32 bus and a Downtown Ithaca bound TCAT Route 30 bus were seen at E State St & Mitchell St in Collegetown.
A Lansing bound TCAT Route 30 bus and a Downtown Ithaca bound TCAT Route 30 bus were seen at E State St & Mitchell St in Collegetown.
A Downtown Ithaca bound TCAT Route 30 bus was seen at East Ave & Campus Rd on the Cornell University campus.
A Downtown Ithaca bound TCAT Route 17 bus was seen at East Ave & Campus Rd on the Cornell University campus.
A Downtown Ithaca bound TCAT Route 30 bus was seen at East Ave & Campus Rd on the Cornell University campus.
A Downtown Ithaca bound TCAT Route 51 bus was seen at East Ave & Campus Rd on the Cornell University campus.
